name: CRON-O-Meter Dark (cronometer)
description: A simple dark style for CRON-O-Meter for those of us that don't like being blinded by the light. (cronometer.com) Some time ago there was a Calories Summary-box added, which I don't like. This theme doesn't correctly show the summary as I don't use it (hide it by clicking the cogwheel and changing the setting). Feel free to create and post some rules to fix it if you care, I'll add it to this style. For suggestions, questions or anything else you can contact me at zarnaikstandard@gmail.com.
additional_info: 2015-01-14: Added the option to choose whether the user wants to hide or display the Calories Summary box. 2015-02-09: Modified to work with the changes of the cronometer HTML. 2018-07-08: Small fixes, changed charts to fit the dark theme.
